column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Josh - Thank you for your review. In the 5-1/2 years that our restaurant has been open
column2: we have never received a review like this. We are genuinely surprised by your reporting since we have an excellent busser team that attends to our restrooms every half hour. Furthermore
column3: just like any other restaurant in the city
column4: our house gets routine inspections from the City of Houston Health Department
